name: Sumo Shooters
description:
Sumo Shooters is a local multiplayer mobile game that mixes billiards with sumo. It is made with the Unity Engine.

Features

Versus - Fight your friends to see who can launch the other off the stage 5 times first!

Power-Ups - Collect the power-up crystals that spawn on the map to gain a temporary advantage on the field!

Stages - Multiple unique stages to battle on!

Customization - Choose the colors for your sumo shooter!
